item.description:
Hi Everyone,

The weather looks good ------Sunday: Sunny, with a high near 72. Northwest wind between 5 and 15 mph.

http://www.usairnet.c...



I am going and will really want to check out this place.
Join me if you are interested.




This is a first time trip and exploration for this group at this location, i have not been here before but have studied it via satellite and have read the reviews of other groups and personal testament that have gone here and everyone liked it.

The following pictures are from the WOOSTER GROUP and the place looks really good and clean..etc..

33 pictures look good for sure, Thanks Wooster Group.


http://paddling.meetu...





Since there is a travel time of maybe an hour i have the start/meeting time of apx 1 pm.

I see a parking area that looks like it will hold 20 of us ??, the river looks nice but thats the idea for this trip..TO CHECK IT OUT.


I will update closer to the day of the event if there is any necessary weather changes..


______________________________________________________________________________________



GETTING THERE:
From Hartford, CT:

Merge onto I-91 N toward Springfield
Entering Massachusetts for 25.9 mi


Take exit x? for I-291 E/US-20 E toward I-90/Mass.Pike E
0.2 mi

follow signs for I-291 East and merge onto I-291 E/US-20 East
Continue to follow I-291 E for 5.0 mi

Take the I-90 E/I-90 W exit toward Masspike/Boston/Albany
0.3 mi

Merge onto I-90 East toward Boston Direction and go apx 11.5 mi

Take exit 8 toward MA-32/US-20/Palmer/Ware
0.3 mi

Merge onto Palmer Ware
Partial toll road

Once under the Mass Pike bridge, take a left onto HIGH st for 0.4 miles

Keep Right onto CHURCH st then take RIVER st for 1.4 miles

Take a left onto STATE st go apx 0.7 miles

Bear Right onto JIM ASS st for 1.1 miles

Keep strait on and Continue onto Bondsville Rd for 1.5 mi

Turn left at Cold Spring Rd and go apx 0.1 miles or over bridge and turn left into the parking lot,
Park so we can all fit...

OR Just follow your GPS:
525 Cold Spring Rd
Belchertown, MA 01007


xxxxxxxxxXxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Kayaks available:

Paddle & PDF with whistle included,

Dougnation of 20 bucks for my kayaks reserved for this particular event.

Please make sure you are familiar with the yak you choose and CAN FIT IN THEM.


I will only bring the yaks that are confirmed by a yes and by persons i have some familiarity with..

Maybee's obviously can't reserve any yaks and if ya reserve one and don't show up ya won't ever get a second chance to again.

Sorry i don't like to leave un-attended yaks on the trailer. They get stolen too easily.


IF USING MY YAKS YOU CANT LOOK LIKE A BONEHEADED BEGINNER AND STEP INTO THEM VIA THE FLOOR OR DRIVE UP ON SHORE WITH THEM LIKE YOU ARE GOING TO A DRIVE IN MOVIE. READ THE INFO ON THE FOLLOWING LINK: I will also show you the correct way and you will look like a intelligent seasoned pro and impress the others who don't know how. Or you may laugh at the ones that fall in who don't know how.
http://www.ehow.com/h...

Please review the links below for the equipment specifications to be at least familiar with which boat or equipment you would be best suited for.

Cheap LIfe Jackets with a whistle is all i have for you since a GOOD QUALITY LIFE JACKET should be chosen for your particular body shapes and paddling style, if you have your own please bring it..
------------------
All my yaks come with Werner Carbon Kalliste Paddles (my recommended brand and type). Different lengths and types of the same version are in the bucket.

http://www.wernerpadd...

(No ya cant use these paddles for paddle float entry practice. i have some cheap ones for that.)-
---------------------

Also for comfort is my favourtie Yak Pad optional accessory to all yaks on trips that we are actually going somewhere..

http://www.yakpads.co...

-----------------------

Riot Tourlite 15, Blue, Rudder Equipped.
For small paddler (apx 150 lbs) with Intermediate Experience.

http://wickedwaters.c...

, transitional kayak, 15'= THIS KAYAK IS FOR SALE $550.00.....I will have this at the event to try... = Not Reserved yet

----------------------------

Cobra Expidition, Yellow, Rudder Equipped.
For an average sized paddler average (150 to 220 lbs) with Intermediate experience.

http://www.cobrakayak...

, Fast Sea kayak, , Sit On Top type, moderate to low initial stability, 18', = (depends on water temp, kind of cold ?)= NOT AVAILABLE YET water too cold.

------------------------------

Eddyline Wind Dancer, Red, Rudder Equipped.
For almost any sized paddler with Novice and up skills.

http://www.epinions.c...

, highly stable (initial & secondary) comfortable Sea kayak, 18'= CHERI's GUEST

---------------------------------

NDK Greenlander Pro, Red, Skeg Equipped.
Medium sized paddler (150-200 lbs) with Intermediate to Advanced skills.

http://www.atlanticka...

, fast Greenland style Sea kayak, moderated stability, 18'= Not Reserved Yet

------------------------------------

Necky Eliza Composite Ultra Light (Un Modified), Red and White, Skeg Version.
Small to Medium sized paddler (100 - 175 lbs) with Beginner and up skills.

http://www.belhavenca...

, stable and predictable Transitional type Light weight (40 LB) Ladies Kayak, 15'3.5"= Not Reserved Yet

--------------------------------------

Necky Eliza Composite Ultra Light (Modified), Yellow, Skeg Version.
Small to Medium sized paddler (100 - 175 lbs) with Beginner and up skills.

http://www.belhavenca...

, stable and predictable Transitional type Light weight (40 LB) Ladies Kayak, 15'3.5"= Not Reserved Yet

----------------------------------------

Necky Eliza Plastic, Fire Color, Rudder Equipped.
Small to Medium sized paddler (100 - 175 lbs) with Beginner and up skills.

http://www.neckykayak...

, stable and predictable Transitional type moderate weight (50 LB) ladies kayak, 15'3.5"= Not Reserved Yet

------------------------------------------

Guillemot Night Heron

Medium Sized Paddler (apx 150 - 220 Lbs) with beginner/intermediate and up skills.

http://www.guillemot-...

Generally stable and predictable Sea kayak with Greenland style hull (45 lbs), 18' =
Not Reserved Yet.

-----------------------------------------------------------------


Ok see ya all there.
al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Look for ORANGE STRIPED TRAFFIC CONES @ parking area

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: SUNDAY--> SWIFT RIVER EXPIDITION and Barbie-Q Riverside or nearby.
